events.message: I ordered a pair of running shoes last week, but I want to return them because they don't fit and I need a refund.
The customer issue is identified and categorized as a refund request due to product return and money back demand.
Support agent Jane Smith has been assigned to handle this refund request and communicate further details with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the shoes that didnâ€™t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the shoes are unused and in the original packaging for the return?
Yes, the order number is 123456789, and the shoes are unused in the original box, ready to be returned.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the return process and scheduled a pickup. Refund will be processed within 5 business days after we receive the shoes.
That sounds good, thanks for the quick response and clear instructions on returning the product.
The refund case is now considered resolved as return logistics are confirmed and the customer is informed about the refund timeline.
Checking in to confirm you have sent the shoes back and to ensure you received your refund as promised.
Yes, I sent the shoes yesterday and I already received the refund today. Thanks for your help!
The case has been formally closed after confirming that the refund was completed and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
A customer satisfaction survey invitation has been sent to gather feedback on the refund and support experience.
